INSERT INTO sales_invoices (lexware_invoice_id, invoice_number, customer_name, customer_address,
  total_net, total_vat, total_gross, invoice_date, due_date, lexware_contact_id,
  currency, paid_amount, status, lexware_raw_data, lexware_synced_at, lexware_sync_status, source)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.lexware_invoice_id }}',
  '{{ $json.invoice_number }}',
  '{{ $json.customer_name.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.customer_address.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  {{ $json.total_net }},
  {{ $json.total_vat }},
  {{ $json.total_gross }},
  {{ $json.invoice_date ? "'" + $json.invoice_date + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.due_date ? "'" + $json.due_date + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.lexware_contact_id ? "'" + $json.lexware_contact_id + "'" : "NULL" }},
  '{{ $json.currency }}',
  {{ $json.paid_amount }},
  '{{ $json.status }}'::sales_invoice_status,
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.raw_data).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  now(), 'synced', 'lexware'
)
ON CONFLICT (lexware_invoice_id) WHERE lexware_invoice_id IS NOT NULL
DO UPDATE SET
  invoice_number = EXCLUDED.invoice_number,
  customer_name = EXCLUDED.customer_name,
  customer_address = EXCLUDED.customer_address,
  total_net = EXCLUDED.total_net,
  total_vat = EXCLUDED.total_vat,
  total_gross = EXCLUDED.total_gross,
  invoice_date = EXCLUDED.invoice_date,
  due_date = EXCLUDED.due_date,
  paid_amount = EXCLUDED.paid_amount,
  status = EXCLUDED.status,
  lexware_raw_data = EXCLUDED.lexware_raw_data,
  lexware_synced_at = now(),
  updated_at = now()
RETURNING id, invoice_number, status::text;

INSERT INTO lexware_sync_log (sync_direction, entity_type, lexware_id, action, sync_status, error_message)
VALUES ('pull', 'sales_invoice', '{{ $('Parse Event Data').item.json.lexware_invoice_id }}', 'fetch', 'error', 'API call failed');
